nodes.text: Lishma was a Gotal smuggler who worked for Mazzic. He accompanied the Corellian Myke to the Whistler's Whirlpool Tapcafe on Trogan for what became the first meeting of the Smugglers' Alliance. When Lieutenant Reynol Kosk and his men attacked, Lishma was killed in the firefight.
In the comic adaptation of The Last Command, Lishma was incorrectly represented with three horns instead of two like other Gotals.
